turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Weza, KwaZulu-Natal.
turn.2: Weza, KwaZulu-Natal Weza is a settlement in Ugu District Municipality in the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa.
turn.4: Village some 20 km west of Harding and 50 km east of Kokstad.
turn.5: How did Weza, KwaZulu-Natal get its name?
turn.6: It takes its name from the Weza River, a northern tributary of the Mtamvuna River.
turn.8: Of Zulu origin, the name is said to mean ‘to cause to cross over’.
turn.9: What kind of businesses are there in Weza?
turn.10: The main business activity in Weza is the Hans Marensky saw mill that has been operational for more than 30years in the area.
turn.11: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.12: The Weza State forest close to town offers visitors a relaxing breakaway with lovely hiking trails and mountain biking trails.
